lom:description.lom:string:
Website for Cambridge's DoITPoMS project. There are two major resources on this site: 1. Micrograph Library and 2. Library of Teaching and Learning Packages.
The goal of this project is: * To create a primary archive of photomicrographs, digital video clips, etc, for use by teachers in developing secondary resources, and as a teaching and learning resource in its own right. * To create a library of exemplar teaching and learning packages (TLPs) covering common topics and making use of video clips and other material from the primary archive.

lom:title.lom:string: Dissemination of IT for the Promotion of Materials Science (DoITPoMS)
